message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.RO 

The paper deals with continual learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The focus is on deep learning, which is a subfield of artificial intelligence. The paper also discusses applications related to computer vision and robotics. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CV (Computer Vision). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of Memory Aware Synapses, which is a neural network architecture, indicating that cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the application of the proposed method to robotics, indicating that cs.RO (Robotics) is also a possible sub-category.
